title: Government: Constitution (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the Constitution subcategory within Government. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: That country is prohibited by its constitution from exercising military force overseas.
cards.romaji: Sono kuni wa kaigai de no gunjiryoku koshi o kenpo ni yori kinshi sarete imasu.
cards.japanese: その国は海外での軍事力行使を憲法により禁止されています。
